connections_description: Configure the required connections to enable access to the dashboard, reports and all platform features.
catalog_management: Manage products with the Catalog API
catalog_management_desc: Manage your catalogs and the products you want to promote using Meta technologies.
messenger_customer_messaging: Interact with customers through Messenger from Meta
messenger_customer_messaging_desc: Respond to messages sent to your Facebook Page. You can set up automated replies or use a human agent to respond.
fundraising_campaigns: Create or manage fundraising campaigns on Facebook and Instagram
fundraising_campaigns_desc: Raise funds and reach more people with the Fundraising Campaign API. Create or manage existing fundraising campaigns on Facebook and Instagram.
instagram_content_desc: Publish posts, share stories, reply to comments and direct messages using the Instagram API.
live_video_api_desc: Use the Live Video API to broadcast live videos on Facebook.
oembed_embeds: Embed Facebook, Instagram and Threads content on other sites
oembed_embeds_desc: Use the oEmbed API to embed content from Meta platforms—such as photos and videos—on external websites.
pages_management_desc: Publish content and videos, moderate posts and comments, and monitor engagement insights using the Pages API.
marketing_ads_management: Create and manage ads with the Marketing API
marketing_ads_management_desc: Create, manage and optimize ad campaigns across Meta technologies with programmatic control.
marketing_ads_measurement: Measure ad performance using the Marketing API
marketing_ads_measurement_desc: Maximize ROI with performance data to optimize budgets, creatives, audiences and reach.
marketing_lead_ads: Capture and manage ad leads with the Marketing API
marketing_lead_ads_desc: Offer potential clients a fast and secure way to sign up and receive information about your business.
app_ads_campaigns_desc: Promote your app, drive installs and create campaigns that encourage users to download and engage.
threads_api_desc: Authenticate users, retrieve data, post threads, configure replies and gather profile insights.
whatsapp_connect_desc: Start conversations, send notifications, click-to-WhatsApp ads and provide support.
meta_audience_network: Monetize your app with Meta Audience Network
meta_audience_network_desc: Monetize your app with ads from Meta advertisers using the Reporting API.
use_cases_description: Configure the necessary connections to enable access to the dashboard, reports and all system functionalities.
name: Name
description_name: Full name of the company or workspace.

description_industry: The industry your company operates in.

description_city: The city where your address is located.
description_administrative_area: The state or province where your address is located.
description_postal_code: The postal code or ZIP code of your address.
description_timezone: Select the timezone for your workspace.
description_currency: Select the default currency for transactions and reporting.
description_date_format: Select the preferred date display format.

create_a_new_password_for_your_account: Create a new password for your account

connection_name_description: Enter the name of your connection that will be saved in our database
login_facebook_description:

select_a_page_to_finish_creating_the_con: Choose the Instagram you want to connect to finish creating the connection.
whastapp_messaging_description: Interact with customers on WhatsApp Reply to messages sent directly to your WhatsApp Business number
state_province_description: Please select your state or province.
confirm_delete_connection: Do you really want to delete the connection?
publish_in_description: Select the profiles or pages where the post will be published.
post_content_description: Write the complete content of your post in the field, including the message you wish to communicate.
post_caption_will_appear_here: The caption for your post will appear here
enter_your_full_name: Enter your full legal name as it appears on your official identification.
date_of_birth_description: This information is required to verify your age and provide age-appropriate services.
gender_description: Select your gender from the options.
provide_valid_phone_number: Please provide a valid phone number where we can reach you if needed.
specify_the_country: Please specify the country you are currently residing in.
address_line_1_description: Enter the primary line of your physical address, typically including your house or building number and street name.
address_line_2_description: This field is optional and can be used to provide any additional address details, such as apartment number, suite, floor, or any other relevant information.
enter_your_city: Enter the name of the city or locality where your address is located.
enter_postal_code: Enter the postal code or ZIP code associated with your address.
provide_valid_email_address: Please provide a valid email address that you have access to.
email_change_description: To change your email, confirm your password.
select_your_preferred_language: Select your preferred language from the available options.
select_your_current_timezone_from_list: Select your current time zone from the list of available options.
item_support_description: Check this box if you require additional support or assistance with your item.
featured_items_description: Check this box if you want your items to be featured or highlighted on our
enter_your_password: Enter your current password to verify your identity.
account_password_description: This is the password you use to log in to your account.
device_history_description: Access and control your currently connected devices.
request_permission_message: We'd like to request your browser's permission to display notifications.
when_would_you_prefer_to_receive_notific: When would you prefer to receive notifications?
daily_overview_task_activity: Receive a daily overview ('Daily Digest') of your task activity.
email_notifications_message: To reduce interruptions, email notifications are bundled and delivered when you're not actively using your device.
account_deactivation_message: When you initiate the account deletion process, you'll no longer have access to Front account services, and your personal data will be permanently removed. You have a 10-day window to cancel the deletion if needed.
account_deactivation_confirmation: Confirm that I want to delete my account.
choose_environment_to_access: Choose below the environment you want to access on the system.
click_to_access_this_workspace: Click to access this workspace and view your data.
add_your_social_media_accounts_descripti: Connect at least one social media account now to get started. The more accounts you connect, the more time you save cross-posting, engaging, and growing your brand on social media.
pro_tip_message: users who set up multiple accounts have better results with their social media efforts.
type_here_post_content: Type the content of your post here.
access_and_control_your_active_sessions: Access and manage your active sessions
confirm_logout_session: Do you really want to close this session?
set_message_tone: Set the tone of the message
please_wait_to_finish: Please wait for it to finish. Do not close this screen.
insert_your_variable_value: Enter the value of your variable
category_default_desc: Send messages with media and customized buttons to engage your customers.
category_catalog_desc: Send messages that drive sales by connecting your product catalog.
category_call_permission_desc: Ask customers if you can call them on WhatsApp.
category_utility_default_desc: Send messages about an existing order or account.
category_auth_default_desc: Send codes to verify a transaction or login.
choose_code_delivery_setup: Choose how customers send the code from WhatsApp to your app.
box_must_be_checked_template: This box must be checked to submit this template.
send_code_automatically: Automatically send code without requiring interaction.
selecting_zero_tap_understand_terms: By selecting zero-tap, I understand the terms of use...
code_sends_when_customers_tap_button: The code sends to your app when customers tap the button.
you_can_add_up_to_5_apps: You can add up to 5 apps.
add_text_in_required_fields: Add text in all required fields
content_message_template: Content for authentication message templates can't be edited. You can add additional content from the options below.
add_expiration_time_for_the_code: Add expiration time for the code
after_the_expires_autofill_button_disabl: After the code expires, the autofill button will be disabled.
recommended_set_custom_validity_period: It's recommended to set a custom validity period...
set_custom_validity_period: Set custom validity period for your message
choose_message_format: Choose the message format that best fits your needs.
include_entire_catalog: Include the entire catalog to give your users a comprehensive view.
include_up_to_30_products: Include up to 30 products from the catalog.
you_cannot_add_media_to_this_template: Please note that you cannot add media to this template. Instead, you can link your catalog to showcase your products.
add_a_header_body_footer: Add a header, body and footer for your template. Cloud API hosted by Meta will review the template variables.
only_one_button_is_supported_for_this_ty: Only one button is supported for this type of template. The button text is not editable.
create_buttons_that_let_customers_respon: Create buttons that let customers respond to your message or take action.
no_buttons_added_yet: No buttons added yet. Click "Add button" to start.
your_message_will_appear_here: Your message text will appear here...
category_flows_desc: Submit a form to collect information about customer interest, appointment requests, or to conduct surveys.
category_order_desc: Send messages through which customers can make payment.
category_order_status_desc: Send messages to inform customers about the progress of their orders.
select_desired_items_to_finish_creating_: Select the desired items to complete the connection creation
template_creation_description: Create reusable message templates to start marketing, utility, or authentication conversations with your customers.
error_cannot_add_named_with_numbers: It is not possible to add a variable of type 'Text', the model already contains numeric variables
error_cannot_add_number_with_text: It is not possible to add a numeric variable, the model already contains variables of type 'Text'
error_header_limit_reached: The model has already reached the maximum possible variables in the header
select_at_least_one_entity: Select at least one entity to invite
are_you_sure_delete_lead: Are you sure you want to delete this lead?
are_you_sure_delete_connection: Are you sure you want to delete this connection?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_comment: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
experience_an_unified_intelligent_platfo: Experience a unified, intelligent platform to connect channels, automate  journeys, and elevate your customer operations.
powering_the_future_of_intelligent_omnic: Powering the Future of Intelligent Omnichannel Integration
discover_astenir: Discover Astenir — a next-generation platform built on a solid architecture (AST) that continuously evolves (NIR). Unify channels, automate journeys, and orchestrate seamless customer interactions with enterprise-level precision.
join_an_evolving_ecosystem: Join an evolving ecosystem where intelligence, structure, and performance converge.
reset_your_password_in_few_steps: Reset your password in just a few simple steps to regain access to your account.
an_email_with_instructions_to_reset_your: An email with instructions to reset your password has been sent. Please confirm the request to proceed. If you don't see the message, please also check your spam or junk mail folder.
start_with_astenir: Start with Astenir — a next-generation platform built on a solid architecture (AST) that continuously evolves (NIR). Create your account to unify channels, automate journeys, and orchestrate seamless customer experiences with enterprise-level precision.
did_not_receive_the_email: Didn't receive the email? Check your inbox, spam, or filters.
for_your_safety_verify_your_email: For your safety, verify your email.
please_wait_before_resending_the_email: Please wait before resending the email.

templates_examples_statement_available_1:

Please log into your account to view your statement.
templates_examples_support_ticket_acknow: Your request {{number}} is registered. We will contact you within {{number}} hours.
templates_examples_technician_arrival_de: Hi {{text}}, our technician will arrive at your location within the next {{text}}. Tap to track real-time location.
templates_examples_upgrade_confirmation_: We are pleased to inform you that your internet speed has been upgraded to {{number}} Mbps. Thank you for choosing our services.
templates_examples_renewal_reminder_desc: Your {{text}} plan is scheduled to renew on {{date}}. Please maintain sufficient balance to keep the service active.
two_factor_authentication_description: Increase your account security by requiring a secondary verification code when signing in.
toggle_to_enable_setup: Toggle to start the security setup.
auth_app_intro_text: The QR Code must be scanned within an authentication app. We suggest the following:
auth_app_google_desc: Simple, widely supported on iOS and Android.
auth_app_microsoft_desc: Excellent for Microsoft accounts, supports push notifications.
auth_app_authy_desc: Known for easy, encrypted cloud backups across multiple devices.
enter_the_code_generated_by_your_authent: Enter the 6-digit code generated by your app.
enter_otp_login_desc: Open the authenticator app on your phone (Google, Microsoft, Authy) and enter the 6-digit code below.
otp_invalid_length: The code must be 6 digits long.
otp_verification_failed: Invalid or expired code. Please try again.
enter_code_from_authenticator_app:
Two-factor authentication (2FA) is enabled. 
Open your app (like Google Authenticator or Authy) and enter the 6-digit code.
question_title: What do you want to do today?
question_subtitle:
Select a goal below. 
The system will automatically generate the ideal block and connection architecture to get started.
option_whatsapp_impact: The system will create a flow with menus of options, text responses and human overflow rules.
option_website_impact: Generates a floating widget, frequently asked questions (FAQ) blocks, and lead capture.
option_instagram_impact: Configure triggers for Story responses, comments on posts and Direct automation.
option_scratch_impact: It starts with a blank canvas (clean canvas) for you to draw your logic manually.
footer_note: You will be able to edit and add new channels at any time after this initial setup.
ia_generation_message:
This choice creates a recommended starting structure. 
Don't worry: you can freely edit, delete or add new blocks after creation.
choose_architecture_title: What do you want to do in the system?
choose_architecture_subtitle: Select an option below to begin setup.
instagram_description: Generates story triggers, comments and automatic responses in DM.
scratch_description: Launches a blank canvas for you to manually drag and drop blocks.
fill_details_below_to_connect_website: Fill in the details below to add a new website to the workspace.
ensure_url_starts_with_http: Make sure the URL starts with http:// or https://
website_url_description: Enter the full URL of the website (http or https).
update_profile_error_message: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
select_the_desired_connection: Select the desired connection to access the next page
workspace_name_validation: Workspace name must be at least {{var}} characters
workspace_name_validation_var: Workspace name must be at least {{var}} characters
workspace_description_validation_var: Workspace description must be at least {{var}} characters
invalid_email_validation: Please provide a valid business email
phone_min_digits_var: Phone must have at least {{var}} digits
name_validation_var: Name must be at least {{var}} characters
facebook_ads: Connect your Facebook account to automatically import your Pixels.
track_evolution: Track the evolution of leads and events.
events will appear here: The events will appear here in real time.
overview_of_the_project: Overview of the Euro Motors BMW project
are_you_sure_do_you_want_disconnect_meta: When you disconnect, we will stop receiving data from this integration.
